languages.text: "Ты служишь Теодоре или династии? Ведь на текущий момент династия — это я".
"Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."
languages.original_text: "Ты служишь Теодоре или династии? Ведь на текущий момент династия — это я".

traits.locale_text: "Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."
"Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."
"Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."
"Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."
"Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."
"Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."

languages.text: «¿Sirves a Theodora o a la dinastía? Porque, ahora mismo, yo soy la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sirves a Theodora o a la dinastía? Porque, ahora mismo, yo soy la dinastía».

languages.text: “你是为西奥多拉服务，还是为王朝服务？因为此时此刻，我就是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。”
languages.original_text: "Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: “你是为西奥多拉服务，还是为王朝服务？因为此时此刻，我就是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。”

languages.text: 「君はシオドーラか、あるいは王朝に仕えているのか？なぜなら、今は{mf|俺|私}が当主だからだ」
languages.original_text: "Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: 「君はシオドーラか、あるいは王朝に仕えているのか？なぜなら、今は{mf|俺|私}が当主だからだ」

languages.text: "Dient Ihr Theodora oder der Dynastie? Im Moment bin nämlich ich die Dynastie."
languages.original_text: "Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Dient Ihr Theodora oder der Dynastie? Im Moment bin nämlich ich die Dynastie."

languages.text: « Vous servez Théodora ou bien la dynastie ? Parce qu'il se trouve qu'à l'heure actuelle, je suis son incarnation suprême. »
languages.original_text: "Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: « Vous servez Théodora ou bien la dynastie ? Parce qu'il se trouve qu'à l'heure actuelle, je suis son incarnation suprême. »

languages.text: "Theodora'ya mı hizmet ediyorsun yoksa hanedanlığa mı? Şu anda hanedanlık benim."
languages.original_text: "Do you serve Theodora or the dynasty? Because at this moment, I am the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora'ya mı hizmet ediyorsun yoksa hanedanlığa mı? Şu anda hanedanlık benim."
